trans-unit.source: OpenAI Model: Model used for alt text generation. All models use the Responses API. gpt-5-mini is the recommended cost-efficient default; gpt-5-nano is the cheapest option.
OpenAI Image Detail: Detail level for vision input. "auto" lets the model decide (recommended), "low" uses fewer tokens at reduced resolution, "high" enables full resolution at higher cost.
Disable Alt Text Generation: Disable AI-Generation of alternative text.
Mindful API URL: URL of the external accessibility scanner API.
Mindful API Token: Authentication token for the external accessibility scanner API.
